references.paper_title: Recovering three-dimensional shape around a corner using ultrafast time-of-flight imaging
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in NLOS imaging, introducing the use of ultrafast time-of-flight techniques for 3D shape recovery around corners.

references.paper_title: Confocal non-line-of-sight imaging based on the light-cone transform
references.reason: This paper is highly influential for introducing confocal NLOS imaging and the light-cone transform, which is a key technique used in many subsequent NLOS methods.

references.paper_title: Non-line-of-sight imaging with partial occluders and surface normals
references.reason: This work significantly advances NLOS capabilities by incorporating partial occluders and surface normal information into the reconstruction process.

references.paper_title: Wave-based non-line-of-sight imaging using fast FK migration
references.reason: This paper introduces a wave-based approach to NLOS reconstruction, leveraging the efficiency of the Fast FK migration algorithm for enhanced speed and accuracy.

references.paper_title: Learned feature embeddings for non-line-of-sight imaging and recognition
references.reason: This highly cited paper demonstrates the power of deep learning techniques for improving the quality and efficiency of NLOS reconstruction, paving the way for data-driven approaches.
